resources.string: Discover the purpose of LUID, the Kapampangan language learning app, and learn how it promotes language conservation and prolongation.
Learn more about the dedicated team behind LUID, their passion for Kapampangan and language preservation, and the expertise they bring to the table to create an innovative language learning app.
